gw.plugin.billing

Interface IBillingSummaryPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IBillingSummaryPlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Plugin used to retrieve billing info from an external system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BillingPeriodInfo[] getPoliciesBilledToAccount(java.lang.String accountNumber)
      Returns all open policies billed to the given account in Billing System.
      BillingAccountInfo[] retrieveAccountBillingSummaries(java.lang.String accountNumber)
      Returns the billing information for the specified account number.
      BillingAccountInfo[] retrieveAccountBillingSummaries(java.lang.String[] accountNumbers)
      Returns the billing information for the specified array of account numbers.
      BillingInvoiceInfo[] retrieveAccountInvoices(java.lang.String accountNumber)
      Returns all invoices of this account.
      BillingPeriodInfo[] retrieveBillingPolicies(java.lang.String accountNumber)
      Returns all open policy periods owned by the given account.
      BillingPeriodInfo retrievePolicyBillingSummary(java.lang.String policyNumber, int termNumber)
      Returns the billing information for the policy period specified by policy number and term number.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveAccountBillingSummaries

        BillingAccountInfo[] retrieveAccountBillingSummaries(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Returns the billing information for the specified account number.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - the number of the account to retrieve information for
        Returns:
        the account billing information

      • retrieveAccountBillingSummaries

        BillingAccountInfo[] retrieveAccountBillingSummaries(java.lang.String[] accountNumbers)
        Returns the billing information for the specified array of account numbers.
        Parameters:
        accountNumbers - the account numbers to retrieve information for
        Returns:
        the account billing information

      • retrievePolicyBillingSummary

        BillingPeriodInfo retrievePolicyBillingSummary(java.lang.String policyNumber,
                                               int termNumber)
        Returns the billing information for the policy period specified by policy number and term number.
        Parameters:
        policyNumber - the policy number of the policy period
        termNumber - the term of the policy period
        Returns:
        the policy period billing information

      • retrieveBillingPolicies

        BillingPeriodInfo[] retrieveBillingPolicies(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Returns all open policy periods owned by the given account.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - the account number of the given account
        Returns:
        an array of policy period billing information

      • getPoliciesBilledToAccount

        BillingPeriodInfo[] getPoliciesBilledToAccount(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Returns all open policies billed to the given account in Billing System. Usually, those are policies with Alt Billing Account set to the given account.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - the account number of the given account
        Returns:
        an array of policy period billing information

      • retrieveAccountInvoices

        BillingInvoiceInfo[] retrieveAccountInvoices(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Returns all invoices of this account.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - the account number
        Returns:
        an array of billing invoice
